span.style: font-family: Comic Sans MS; font-weight: normal; color: #550000; font-style: normal
font-family: 微软雅黑; font-weight: normal; color: #000000; font-style: normal

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj.有多种理解方式的；不确定的：open to more than one interpretation；doubtful or uncertain
【例】Students have ambiguous feelings about their role in the world. 学生们为他们在世界中的角色感到迷茫。Frustrated by ambiguous instructions 因为不明确的指示而受挫
【近】doubtful, equivocal[ɪ'kwɪvəkl], unclear, uncertain
【反】distinct, pellucid, patent, blatant, explicit, lucid, perspicuous 清楚的，明显的
【记】 ambi 两，模棱两可 + 音：过，两边都说得过去，含糊其词
